description: [``botocore``] Amazon Kendra now supports indexing and querying documents in different languages.
[``botocore``] Initial release of the SDK for Amazon Managed Grafana API.
[``botocore``] Allow support for Amazon Opensearch Service(successor to Amazon Elasticsearch Service) as a Kinesis Data Firehose delivery destination.
[``botocore``] Launch of AWS Backup Vault Lock, which protects your backups from malicious and accidental actions, works with existing backup policies, and helps you meet compliance requirements.
[``botocore``] This release enables customers to configure Chime MediaCapturePipeline via API.
